# Data Quality

```{r coverage, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
cov <- read_csv("data/voting/display/tract_coverage.csv")
kable(cov, "latex", caption = "Tract coverage.", longtable = T, booktabs = T, align = 'c') %>%
  kable_styling(latex_options = "repeat_header")
```
